ConfigurationOption.Value: select * from ( select am.assetnum, null location, am.pointnum, am.metername, m.description, x.measurementvalue, x.observation, x.measuredate, x.measurementid, mp.loweraction, mp.lowerwarning, mp.upperaction, mp.upperwarning, am.siteid, m.measureunitid, m.metertype, am.assetmeterid from meter m left join assetmeter am on m.metername = am.metername left join measurepoint mp on am.assetnum = mp.assetnum and am.metername = mp.metername and am.siteid = mp.siteid left join measurement x on am.assetnum = x.assetnum and am.metername = x.metername and am.siteid = x.siteid where x.measurementvalue is not null or x.observation is not null union select am.assetnum, null location, am.pointnum, am.metername, m.description, x.reading, null, x.readingdate, x.meterreadingid, null, null, null, null, am.siteid, m.measureunitid, m.metertype, am.assetmeterid from meter m left join assetmeter am on m.metername = am.metername left join meterreading x on am.assetnum = x.assetnum and am.metername = x.metername and am.siteid = x.siteid where x.reading is not null union select null assetnum, lm.location, lm.pointnum, lm.metername, m.description, x.measurementvalue, x.observation, x.measuredate, x.measurementid, mp.loweraction, mp.lowerwarning, mp.upperaction, mp.upperwarning, lm.siteid, m.measureunitid, m.metertype, lm.locationmeterid from meter m left join locationmeter lm on m.metername = lm.metername left join measurepoint mp on lm.location = mp.location and lm.metername = mp.metername and lm.siteid = mp.siteid left join measurement x on lm.location = x.location and lm.metername = x.metername and lm.siteid = x.siteid where x.measurementvalue is not null or x.observation is not null union select null assetnum, lm.location, lm.pointnum, lm.metername, m.description, x.reading, null, x.readingdate, x.meterreadingid, null, null, null, null, lm.siteid, m.measureunitid, m.metertype, lm.locationmeterid from meter m left join locationmeter lm on m.metername = lm.metername left join locmeterreading x on lm.location = x.location and lm.metername = x.metername and lm.siteid = x.siteid where x.reading is not null ) X

Struct._value: := ${Measurement Value} is not null and ${Meter Type} = 'GAUGE' and (${Measurement Value} <= ${Lower Warning} or ${Measurement Value} >= ${Upper Warning})
